resources.string: Fill in the information and agree to privacy to login
Please agree to the privacy policy

Privacy Policy for Sandtoner

We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our application and tell you about your privacy rights.

1. THE DATA WE COLLECT

We may collect various types of personal data including your name, contact information, and usage data.

2. HOW WE USE YOUR DATA

We use your data to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure security.

3. YOUR RIGHTS

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.

4. CONTACT US

For questions about this policy, please contact info@sandtoner.com.
